mapper.sql: a.id as "id", a.user_id as "userId", a.ip as "ip", a.timeout as "timeout", a.create_date as "createDate", a.update_date as "updateDate", a.session_str as "sessionStr"
LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON b.id = a.user_id
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_session a
and a.create_date > #{createDate}
order by a.create_date asc limit 100
mapper.insert: insert into sys_session( id, user_id, ip, timeout, create_date, update_date, session_str ) values( #{id}, #{userId}, #{ip}, #{timeout}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{sessionStr} )
mapper.update: update sys_session set user_id=#{userId}, ip=#{ip}, timeout=#{timeout}, create_date=#{createDate}, update_date=#{updateDate}, session_str=#{sessionStr} where id=#{id}
